text: If Retro Studios ever makes a DKC game after Tropical Freeze (which will be very difficult to surpass), they need to incorporate a remade version of this track in it somewhere, as well as Water World. Also, I hope David Wise and possibly Eveline Novakovic (or Fischer as she was known as back then) does the soundtrack. I really admire Wise, but I think Novakovic's contributions should not be overlooked, either.
author: Nate Jacobson

text: +Nate Jacobson I just did a cover of this song, I've always loved how unpleasant it sounds. But yeah Eveline's contribution to this franchises shouldn't go unnoticed. I've never gotten behind all the nagging people had towards this game. The level design varied and the graphics were amazing.

I've played the classics and while modern iterations of old series (New Super Mario Bros Wii, Super Mario Galaxy 2, Donkey Kong Country Returns) aren't as good as the old ones, they are still amazing in their own right. text: @Nupoe I feel the exact same way.  I feel like it was fact that the games of old didn't have gimmicks like a lot of the games have now. Thats why people free such great vivid memories from playing old games. They seem to really appreciate the experiences that they had.
